      • onClick_fetch

        public void onClick_fetch(View v)
        Retrieve a journey from e-mail account. This method, together with onClick_parse(View) and onClick_activate(View) demonstrates how a journey tracking service should be started step-by-step. Note that the Activity _MUST NOT_ become invisible in the middle of this process, otherwise you have to start from fetch() again.
        Parameters:
        v - UI widget.

      • getHardCodedJourneyText

        private java.lang.String getHardCodedJourneyText()

        Returns:
        the journey text.
